attributes.action: Make the BBC a subscription service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the Digital has been here for a while, and that the old system will be switch off soon, If the BBC has so many followers, yet everyone complains about the costs, if we have a choice of channels to pay on Sky, which we can pay for more or not, then the BBC should be scrambled and if you want to watch it then pay for it, then we will see who actually watches it, rather than just being a tax, If I own a TV just for playing on my Playstation/XBOX, then why should I have to pay £150 to BBC?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
